text: @realDonaldTrump @LouDobbs What’s this clown smoking? 100,000+ #COVID19 deaths, a sinking economy that started well before pandemic. Don’t let facts get in the way of BS! U.S. economy shrank at a 5.0% pace in Q1, more than the 4.8% rate of decline initially estimated a month ago. https://t.co/8nXS1YbKK6 https://t.co/aJOPerIFto

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
